enWisdom: Paradise is the abode of peace
Paradise is the reward of the obedient
Paradise is the abode of the pious
Paradise is the goal of the foremost [in righteousness]
Paradise is the most excellent goal
Paradise is the returning place of the victorious
Paradise is the reward of every righteous believer

Wisdom: الْجَنَّةُ خَيْرُ مَآلٍ وَالنَّارُ شَرُّ مَقِيلٍ
enWisdom: Paradise is the best place of return and hellfire is the worst place of residence

Wisdom: الْمُوقِنُونَ وَالْمُخْلِصُونَ وَالْمُؤْثِرُونَ مِنْ رِجَالِ الْأَعْرَافِ
enWisdom: Those who possess certitude, the dedicated [and sincere] ones and the altruistic ones are from the people of the Elevations

Wisdom: إِنَّ أَهْلَ الْجَنَّةِ كُلُّ مُؤْمِنٍ هَيِّنٍ لَيِّنٍ
enWisdom: Verily the people of Paradise constitute all the believers who are easygoing and gentle

Wisdom: إِنَّ لِأَنْفُسِكُمْ أَثْمَاناً فَلَا تَبِيعُوهَا إِلَّا بِالْجَنَّةِ
enWisdom: Verily your souls have [great] value, so do not sell them except for Paradise

Wisdom: إِنْ كُنْتُمْ رَاغِبِينَ لَا مَحَالَةَ فَارْغَبُوا فِي جَنَّةٍ عَرْضُهَا السَّماواتُ وَالْأَرْضُ
enWisdom: If you must be desirous of something, then be desirous of a Paradise, the span of which covers the heavens and the earth

Wisdom: إِنَّكَ لَنْ تَلِجَ الْجَنَّةَ حَتَّى تَزْدَجِرَ عَنْ غَيِّكَ وَتَنْتَهِيَ وَتَرْتَدِعَ عَنْ مَعَاصِيكَ وَتَرْعَوِي
enWisdom: Verily you will not enter Paradise until you restrain yourself from misdeeds and stop [committing them]; and deter yourself from sins and desist [from them]

Wisdom: ظَفِرَ بِجَنَّةِ الْمَأْوَى مَنْ غَلَبَ الْهَوَى
enWisdom: He who overcomes his vain desire is victorious in attaining the Paradise of the [everlasting] Abode

Wisdom: ظَفِرَ بِجَنَّةِ الْمَأْوَى مَنْ أَعْرَضَ عَنْ شَهَوَاتِ [زَخَارِفِ‏] الدُّنْيَا
enWisdom: He who turns away from the lustful desires of this world attains the Garden of Repose [in the Hereafter]
The goal of a believer is Paradise
Every bliss other than Paradise is derisory

Wisdom: هَيْهَاتَ لَا يُخْدَعُ اللَّهُ عَنْ جَنَّتِهِ وَلَا يُنَالُ مَا عِنْدَهُ إِلَّا بِمَرْضَاتِهِ
enWisdom: How impossible! Allah cannot be cheated of His Paradise, and none can attain what is with Him except by His pleasure
The delegation that enters Paradise is constantly showered with blessings
Those who enter Paradise are in perpetual bliss
Paradise is not achieved [simply] by wishing for it

Wisdom: لَا يَفُوزُ بِالْجَنَّةِ إِلَّا مَنْ حَسُنَتْ سَرِيرَتُهُ وَخَلُصَتْ نِيَّتُهُ
enWisdom: None will be victorious in attaining Paradise except one whose heart is good and intention sincere
